html: Today the Senate will vote on a straightforward piece of legislation to protect newborn babies. Let's be clear: The human rights of newborn boys and girls are innate. They don’t come and go based on the circumstances of birth. A newborn baby is a newborn baby. Period.
text:
Today the Senate will vote on a straightforward piece of legislation to protect newborn babies. Let's be clear: The human rights of newborn boys and girls are innate. They don’t come and go based on the circumstances of birth. 
A newborn baby is a newborn baby. Period.

html: My res. w/@RoyBlunt just passed @SenateRules. SRes50 updates Senate rules by reducing post-cloture time from 30 to 2 hours for most noms. Keeps 30 hours for SCOTUS, Circuit Courts, & Cabinet. Post-cloture debate time should be for debate, not delay on an empty Senate floor.
text: My res. w/@RoyBlunt just passed @SenateRules. SRes50 updates Senate rules by reducing post-cloture time from 30 to 2 hours for most noms. Keeps 30 hours for SCOTUS, Circuit Courts, & Cabinet. Post-cloture debate time should be for debate, not delay on an empty Senate floor.

html: 18 of the last 20 years, Congress has passed an omnibus bill instead of completing the 12 annual appropriation bills. html: A 1997 court settlement called Flores v. Reno prevents the gov’t from keeping children with their parents if the parents are charged with a crime for crossing the border illegally. The law doesn't have to be enforced this way due to prosecutorial discretion.
text: A 1997 court settlement called Flores v. Reno prevents the gov’t from keeping children with their parents if the parents are charged with a crime for crossing the border illegally. The law doesn't have to be enforced this way due to prosecutorial discretion.
